name: Fatal Desolation
description:
## Summary

Your space station was attacked and you need to escape. With a defective jetpack auto activating every 10 seconds and your trusty laser pistol, get out of the station, avoid hazards, and kill corrupted astronauts in order to survive...

## Controls

Roll Boosters: Q - E

Horizontal Boosters: A - D

Vertical Boosters: W - D

Shoot: Left click
